V04prmosulu:3: buddhena lokārthacareṇa tāyinā sudeśitaṃ prātimokṣaṃ vidunā // 1 //
V04prmosulu:4: taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śrutvāna dhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitaṃ /
V04prmosulu:6: cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddhotpādaṃ mānuṣikāñ ca śraddhāṃ /
V04prmosulu:8: śīlena yukto śramaṇo 'tiveti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo 'tiveti /
V04prmosulu:9: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ // 4 //
V04prmosulu:10: anekabuddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīva sānuṃ /
V04prmosulu:11: udāhariṣyāmy ahaṃ saṃghamadhye hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // 5 //
V04prmosulu:14: pracchādayanti hṛdayaṃ gaganam iva samunnatā meghāḥ //
V04prmosulu:17: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:19: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
V04prmosulu:23: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ lajjinām abhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:25: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśīlapāpakarmāntāḥ /
V04prmosulu:26: kuṇapam iva samudrato samutkṣiptāḥ śāstu prāvacanāt //
V04prmosulu:27: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te traidhātuke anupaliptāḥ /
V04prmosulu:29: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:31: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
V04prmosulu:33: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣām ātmaśīlehi ye hy upavadanti /
V04prmosulu:34: sabrahmacāriṇaś ca śastā devamanuṣyāś ca duḥśīlāḥ //
V04prmosulu:35: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīlehi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:36: sarvatra nopavadyā vijñānāṃ vai sadevake loke // 16-17 //
V04prmosulu:37: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ yehi /
V04prmosulu:38: āsevitā ca yehi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
V04prmosulu:39: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
V04prmosulu:41: yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmo gaṇottamo /
V04prmosulu:42: śikṣā uddeśo saṃvāso saṃbhogo śāstuno vacanaṃ //
V04prmosulu:44: paricarya dharmarājaṃ te yānti asaṃskṛtaṃ sthānaṃ // 20-21 //
V04prmosulu:45: śuddhasya vai sadā phalguḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
V04prmosulu:48: tāvat sthāsyati saddharmo sāmagrī ca gaṇottame // 23 //
V04prmosulu:49: yāvac ca deśayitāraḥ pratipattāraś ca dharmaratnasya /
V04prmosulu:51: tasmāt samagrāḥ sahitāḥ sagauravāḥ bhaviyā anyamanyaṃ paricaratha /
V04prmosulu:52: dharmarājam adhigacchatha nirvāṇam atandritā acyutam padam aśokam iti // 25 //
V04prmosulu:54: abhikrāntāḥ suvihitāḥ śuddhā nipuṇā anusaṅgāyanto upaniṣaṇṇā,
V04prmosulu:57: anāgatānām āyuḥmanto bhikḥūṇāṃ cchandapāriśuddhim ārocettha, ārocitaṃ ca prativedetha /
V04prmosulu:58: ko bhikḥu bhikḥuṇīnāṃ cchandahārako? nāsti cātra kaścid anupasaṃpanno nāsti utkḥiptako /
V04prmosulu:60: nāsti arhantaghātako, nāsti saṃghabhedako, nāsti tathāgatasya duḥṭacittarudhirotpādako /
V04prmosulu:62: nāsti stainyasaṃvāsiko, nāsti nānāsaṃvāsiko, nāsti asaṃvāsiko /
V04prmosulu:65: tad evaṃ samanvāharantu bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśīlānāṃ /
V04prmosulu:66: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:69: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtyaṃ? alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho so bhavati /
V04prmosulu:70: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V04prmosulu:71_0: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ
V04prmosulu:71_1: samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśeyyā /
V04prmosulu:73: kariṣyati bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātram atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:74: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya, yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:80: girinadījalacapalacañcalopamā āyuḥ saṃskārā muhūrttam api nāvatiṣṭhante /
V04prmosulu:82: tat kasya hetoḥ? apramādādhigatānāṃ hi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ /
V04prmosulu:85: daśārthavaśān sampaśyamānās tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti,
V04prmosulu:93: prasannānāṃ ca bhūyobhāvāya dṛṣṭadhārmikāṇām āśravāṇāṃ nirghātāya (8)
V04prmosulu:96: bāhujanyaṃ vivṛtaṃ suprakāśitaṃ yāvad devamanuṣyeṣv iti /
V04prmosulu:97: imān daśārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśanti /
V04prmosulu:99: taṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta /
V04prmosulu:101: yasya vo siyāpattiḥ so 'viṣkarotu, asantīye āpattīye tūṣṇīṃ bhavitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:102: tūṣṇīmbhāvena kho punar āyuṣmanto pariśuddhā iti vedayiṣyāmi /
V04prmosulu:103: yathā kho punar āyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam eva rūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
V04prmosulu:104: yo puna bhikṣu evaṃrūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo se bhavati /
V04prmosulu:105: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punar āyuṣmanto āntarāyiko dharmo ukto bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:106: tasmāt smaramāṇena bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhiprekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkartavyā /
V04prmosulu:107: āviṣkṛtvā ca se phāsu bhavati, no anāviṣkṛtvā /
V04prmosulu:110: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:111_0: par.1 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣām apratyākhyāya daurbalyam
V04prmosulu:111_1: anāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyam api
V04prmosulu:111_2: sādham ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:113: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemantapakṣe pañcame,
V04prmosulu:118: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:119_0: par.2 yo puna bhikṣu grāmād vā araṇyād vā adinnam anyātakaṃ stainasaṃskāram ādiyeya
V04prmosulu:119_1: yathārūpeṇādinnādānena [rā]jāno gṛhītvā haneṃsu vā bandheṃsu vā pravrājeṃsu vā hambho
V04prmosulu:119_2: puruṣa coro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si stainyo 'sīti vā vadeṃsu,
V04prmosulu:120: tathārūpaṃ bhikṣur adinnam ādiyamāno ayam pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:122: idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe dvitī[ye,
V04prmosulu:124: paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyām āyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kumbhakārajātīyam ārabhya rājānaṃ ca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukūlikaṃ ca bhikṣaṃ /
V04prmosulu:125: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptir dharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:126: par.3 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya śastrahārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeya,
V04prmosulu:128: maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya Ō hambho puruṣa kiṃ te iminā pāpakena durjīvitena dhigjīvitena,
V04prmosulu:129: mṛtaṃ te jīvitāc chreyo Ō iti cittam alaṃ cittasaṃkalpam anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya,
V04prmosulu:130: so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryān nānyena,
V04prmosulu:131: ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,
V04prmosulu:133: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe tṛtīye,
V04prmosulu:135: paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ sambahulān gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūn ārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrājakaṃ /
V04prmosulu:137: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:138: par.4 yo puna bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ prātajāneya ita jānāmi ita paśyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:139: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asa[ma]nugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣo evam avaci Ō ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto avaci jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:141: iti tucchaṃ mṛṣā vilāpam anyatrābhimānāt* ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:142: idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe caturthe,
V04prmosulu:144: purebhaktaṃ uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhucchapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ saṃbahulān grāmavāsikān bhikṣūn ārabhya ābhiyānikaṃ ca bhikṣuṃ /
V04prmosulu:146: yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
V04prmosulu:153: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:154: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ito 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
V04prmosulu:155: yathā pūrve tathā paścād yathā paścāt tathā pūrve pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi saṃvāsaṃ ḥ tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:156: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:157: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:158: pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi ḥ
V04prmosulu:160: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:161: sa.1 saṃcetanikāye śukrasya visṛṣṭīye anyatra svapnāntare saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:162_0: sa.2 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ
V04prmosulu:162_1: samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatarānyatarasya vā punar
V04prmosulu:163: sa.3 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:164_0: sa.4 yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye paricaryāye
V04prmosulu:164_1: varṇaṃ bhāṣeya Ō etad agraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmaṃ
V04prmosulu:164_2: brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:165_0: sa.5 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya istriyāye mataṃ puruṣasyopasaṃhareya
V04prmosulu:165_1: puruṣasya vā mataṃ istriyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārtanena vā antamaśato
V04prmosulu:166: sa.6 svayaṃ yācikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārayamāṇena asvāmikātmoddeśikā kuṭī kārāpayitavyā /
V04prmosulu:167: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dvādaśa vitastīyo sugatavitastinā /
V04prmosulu:172: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe svayaṃyācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeya asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudesanāya,
V04prmosulu:175: sa.7 mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā]payamāṇena sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣū cānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya /
V04prmosulu:178: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudeśanāya,
V04prmosulu:180: sa.8 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo,
V04prmosulu:182: anāttamano śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpattikam amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy evaṃ nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:183: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati /
V04prmosulu:184: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:185: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:186: sa.9 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo,
V04prmosulu:188_0: anāttamano anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya kiñcid eva leśamātrakaṃ dharmam upādāya aparājikaṃ
V04prmosulu:188_1: bhikṣuṃ pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy eva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti,
V04prmosulu:189: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:190: anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya kocid e[va] leśamātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati,
V04prmosulu:191: bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:192: sa.10 yo puna bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vādhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya,
V04prmosulu:193: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi,
V04prmosulu:194: bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V04prmosulu:196: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:197: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:199: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:200: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:201: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:202: sa.11 tasya kho puna bhikṣusya bhikṣū sahāyakā bhonti eko vā,
V04prmosulu:203: dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā,
V04prmosulu:205: te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:206: dharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣur vina[ya]vādī caiṣo bhikṣu,
V04prmosulu:207: asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣu cchandaṃ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V04prmosulu:208: yaṃ caitasya bhikṣusya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V04prmosulu:209: jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
V04prmosulu:210: te bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyā Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha,
V04prmosulu:215: ajānan* caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no jānan* /
V04prmosulu:216: mā āyuṣmanto saṃghabhedaṃ rocentu, saṃghasāmagrīm evāyuṣmanto rocentu /
V04prmosulu:218: samagro hi sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
V04prmosulu:219: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:220: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:221: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu i[ty e]taṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:222: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:223: sa.12 bhikṣuḥ kho puna durvacakajātīyo bhoti /
V04prmosulu:224: so uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V04prmosulu:225: so evam āha Ō mā me āyuṣmanto kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:226: aham apy āyuṣmantānāṃ na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:228: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V04prmosulu:230: bhikṣū pi āyuṣmantaṃ vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vina[yena] /
V04prmosulu:231: āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn vadatu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V04prmosulu:232: evaṃ saṃbaddhā kho punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyasya vacanīyā,
V04prmosulu:234: evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:235: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:236: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:237: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:238: sa.13 saṃbahulā bhikṣū kho punar anyataraṃ grāmam vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upaniśrāya viharanti kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ /
V04prmosulu:239: teṣāṃ te pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:240: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:242: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:243: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:245: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:246: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō cchandagāmī cāyuṣmanto doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho,
V04prmosulu:249: saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti /
V04prmosulu:250: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha /
V04prmosulu:251: na saṃgho cchandagāmī, na saṃgho doṣagāmī, na saṃgho mohagāmī, na saṃgho bhayagāmī /
V04prmosulu:252: na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti, ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti /
V04prmosulu:253: āyuṣmantānām eva khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:254: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
V04prmosulu:256: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
V04prmosulu:257: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:258: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyās tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:259: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ prati[ni]ssareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:260: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
V04prmosulu:273: uddiṣṭā kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:275: yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ato 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā yāvatakaṃ jānan* cchādeti tāvatakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā akāmaparivāsaṃ parivasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:276: parivustaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:277: cīrṇamānatvo bhikṣuḥ kṛtānudharmo āhvayanapratibaddho yatra syād viṃśagaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āhvayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:278: ekabhikṣuṇāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣum āhveya,
V04prmosulu:279: so ca bhikṣu anāhūto te ca bhikṣū garhyāḥ / iyam atra sāmīcī /
V04prmosulu:281: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:282: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:283: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:285: aniy.0 ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:286: aniy.1 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ praticchannāsane alaṃkarmaṇīye eko [ekā]ya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:287: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:288_0: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo
V04prmosulu:288_1: pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā
V04prmosulu:291: aniy.2 na haiva kho punaḥ praticchannāsanaṃ bhavati,
V04prmosulu:293: alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣituṃ pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya /
V04prmosulu:294: tathārūpe ca bhikṣu āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya,
V04prmosulu:295: tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
V04prmosulu:296: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā,
V04prmosulu:297: yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya,
V04prmosulu:298: tena tena so bhikṣu dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
V04prmosulu:302: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:304: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhā?
V04prmosulu:305: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:306: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:308: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissargikapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:309: np.1 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekacīvaraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:311: np.2 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi ced bhikṣuḥ trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra saṃghasaṃmutīye,
V04prmosulu:313: np.3 kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:314: pratigṛhṇitvā kṣipram eva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:315: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣusya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya,
V04prmosulu:316: māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye /
V04prmosulu:317: taduttariṃ nikṣipeya santīye vā asantīye vā pratyāśāye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:318: np.4 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇeya anyatra pallaṭṭhakena nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:319: np.5 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpeya vā rañjāpeya vā ākoṭāpeya vā nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:320: np.6 yo puna bhikṣur anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ [?
V04prmosulu:321: Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yāceya anyatra samaye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:322: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati / ayam atra samayo /
V04prmosulu:323: np.7 ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputrīṃ [Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yācituṃ /
V04prmosulu:324: tam enam abhihṛṣṭo samāno saṃbahulehi cīvarehi pravāreya,
V04prmosulu:327_0: np.8 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikānāṃ cīvaracetāpanāny
V04prmosulu:327_1: abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpanehi civaraṃ
V04prmosulu:328_0: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho puna
V04prmosulu:328_1: yūyam āyuṣmanto imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha /
V04prmosulu:329: evaṃrūpeṇa vā [evaṃrūpeṇa vā] ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:331: np.9 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye ca pratyekacīvaracetāpanāni abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti,
V04prmosulu:332: abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:333: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣman,
V04prmosulu:335_0: imehi pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ
V04prmosulu:335_1: pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchādetha evaṃrūpeṇa vā evaṃrūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
V04prmosulu:337: np.10 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣeya /
V04prmosulu:338: so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō imāni khalv āryam uddiśya itthaṃnāmena rājñā ca rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni,
V04prmosulu:340: tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evam asya vacanīyo Ō na kho punar āyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvaracetāpanāni pratigṛhṇituṃ /
V04prmosulu:341: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
V04prmosulu:342: evam ukte so dūto taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya [sa]nti punar ārya kecid bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarāti /
V04prmosulu:343: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiśitavyāḥ ārāmikā vā /
V04prmosulu:344: ete āyuṣman bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarā ye bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
V04prmosulu:345_0: evam ukte so dūto yena vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān evaṃ
V04prmosulu:345_1: vadeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto vaiyāpṛtyakarā imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ
V04prmosulu:345_2: cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:346_0: so ca dūto tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān saṃjñapayitvā yena so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā na
V04prmosulu:346_1: bhikṣum eva vadeya ye khu te āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiṣṭās te mayā saṃjñaptās
V04prmosulu:347: ācchādayiṣyanti te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
V04prmosulu:348_0: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarārthikena [yena] te vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā
V04prmosulu:348_1: te vaiyāpṛtyakarāḥ sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayitavyā vijñāpayitavyāḥ Ō artho
V04prmosulu:349: sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya ity etat kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:350: no ced abhiniṣpādeya catukkhutto pañcakhutto ṣaṭkhuttoparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇībhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:351: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaṭkkhuttoparamaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:353: no ced abhiniṣpādeya tad uttapanto vā vyāyamanto vā taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya,
V04prmosulu:355: no ced abhiniṣpādeya yena se tāni rājñā vā rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tatra tena bhikṣuṇā svayaṃ vā gantavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:357: yāni khu āyuṣmantehi itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni na khu tāni tasya bhikṣusya kiñcid arthaṃ spharanti,
V04prmosulu:361: (1) daśāhaṃ (2) vipravāso (3) akāle ca (4) pratigraho (5) dhovanā (6) yācanā caṃva /
V04prmosulu:362: (7) sāntarottaraṃ (8-9) dve ca vikalpena (10) rājā ca // prathamo vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:363: np.11 yo puna bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:364: np.12 navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ dve bhāgā ādayitavyās tṛtīyo odātikānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ /
V04prmosulu:366: np.13 yo puna bhikṣuḥ kauśeyamiśrāṇām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:367: np.14 navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena akāmaṃ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:368: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pratyoreṇa taṃ purāṇaṃ santhataṃ visarjayitvā vā avisarjayitvā vā anyaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:370: np.15 navaṃ santhataniṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena tato purāṇasanthatāto samantāt sugatavitastinā bhāgo ādayitavyo navasya durvaṇṇīkaraṇārthaṃ /
V04prmosulu:371: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navasanthataṃ niṣīdanaṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:372: np.16 bhikṣusya kho punar adhvānamārge pratipannasya utpadyeṃsu e[ḍa]kalomāni /
V04prmosulu:374: pratigṛhṇitvā sāmaṃ triyojanaparamaṃ hartavyam asante anyasmi[n] hārake taduttariṃ hāreya sante vā asante vā anyasmi[n] hārake,
V04prmosulu:376: np.17 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye eḍakalomādi dhovāpeya vā raṃjāpe[ya] vā vivaṭāpaye vā,
V04prmosulu:378: np.18 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā antamasato iha nikṣipehīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:380: np.19 yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ krayavikrayavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya saṃyyathīdaṃ imaṃ kriṇa ito kriṇa ettakamettake[na krī]ṇāhīti vā vadeya,
V04prmosulu:382: np.20 yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ jātarūparajatavikṛtivyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:395: np.21 daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekapātraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ / taduttariṃ dhāreya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:396: np.22 yo puna bhikṣu ūnapañcabandhanabaddhena pātreṇa anyaṃ navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeya kāmātām upādāya,
V04prmosulu:397: tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣāye nissaritavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:398: yo tahi bhikṣuparṣāye pātraparyanto bhavati so tasya bhikṣusya anupradātavyo Ō evaṃ te āyuṣman pātro dhārayitavyo yāvad bhedanaṃ,
V04prmosulu:400: np.23 yāni kho punar imāni gilānapratiṣevaṇīyāni bhaiṣajyāni bhavanti sayyathīdaṃ sarpistailamadhuphāṇitaṃ Ō evaṃrūpāṇi gilānena bhikṣuṇā satkṛtyābhigṛhītāni,
V04prmosulu:403: taduttariṃ khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā santaṃ vā śeṣabhū[taṃ] nissareya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:404: np.24 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya cīvaraṃ datvā yathā duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamāno ācchindeya vā ācchindāpayeya vā Ō āhara bhikṣu cīvaraṃ,
V04prmosulu:407: np.25 māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇām iti bhikṣuṇā varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:409: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pra[tyo]reṇa varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣeya, kṛtvā vā snāpeya, nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:410: np.26 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svayaṃyācikāya sūtraṃ tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:411: np.27 bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatiputro vā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya,
V04prmosulu:412: tena ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣmann imaṃ cīvaram āyataṃ ca karohi,
V04prmosulu:417: apy eva nāma vayaṃ pi tava kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃharema,
V04prmosulu:418: māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:419: tatra ca so bhikṣur evaṃ vaditvā na kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃhareya māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:421: np.28 daśāhānāgataṃ kho puna tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī utpadyeya bhikṣusya ātyāyikaṃ cīvaram ātyāyikaṃ manyamāno na bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:424: np.29 upavarṣaṃ kho punaḥ tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī bhikṣu cāraṇyake śayanāsane viharanti samaye sapratibhaye sāśaṃkasaṃmate /
V04prmosulu:425: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyataraṃ cīvaram antaragṛhe nikṣipitavyaṃ,
V04prmosulu:426: syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo tasmāc cīvarād vipravāsāya,
V04prmosulu:427: ṣaḍāhaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc cīvarād vipravasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:428: taduttariṃ vipravaseya anyatra bhikṣu saṃmutīye nissargikapācattikam /
V04prmosulu:429: np.30 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikāṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇatam ātmano pariṇāmeya nissargikapācattikam //
V04prmosulu:432: (26-27) tantuvāyena dve (28) daśāhānāgatam (29) upavarṣaṃ (30) pariṇāmanena // tṛtīyo vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:433: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissarggikapācattikā dharmmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:435: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:436: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:437: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:439: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavatiṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:443_0: pac.4 yo puna bhikṣur jānaṃ saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni dharmeṇa vinayena vihitāni vyupaśāntāni
V04prmosulu:443_1: punaḥ karmāya utkhoṭeya Ō idaṃ punaḥ karma kartavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti Ō etad eva pratyayaṃ
V04prmosulu:443_2: kṛtvā ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya utkhoṭanaṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:444: pac.5 yo puna bhikṣur akalpiyakāro mātṛgrāmasya dharmaṃ deśeya uttari cchahi pañcahi vācāhi anyatra vijñapuruṣapudgalena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:445: pac.6 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannaṃ pudgalaṃ padaśo dharmaṃ vāceya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:446_0: pac.7 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam
V04prmosulu:446_1: alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ pratijāneya Ō iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti bhūtasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:447: pac.8 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattim anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike āroceya anyatra kṛtāye prakāśanāsaṃmutīye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:448: pac.9 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike lābhe bhājīyamāne pūrve samanujño bhūtvā paścāt kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya Ō yathāsaṃstutam evāyuṣmanto,
V04prmosulu:449: jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmayatīti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:450_0: pac.10 yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō kiṃ
V04prmosulu:450_1: punar āyuṣmanto imehi kṣudrānukṣūdrehi śikṣāpadehi uddiṣṭehi yāvad eva bhikṣūṇāṃ
V04prmosulu:454: (6) padaśo (7) viśeṣaṇam (8) ārocanā (9) yathāsaṃstuta (10) vigarhaṇena ca // prathamo vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:458_0: pac.14 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre abhyavakāśe mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā viśikaṃ
V04prmosulu:458_1: vā caturaśrakaṃ vā kurcaṃ vā bimbohanaṃ vā prajñāpetvā vā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā,
V04prmosulu:461: pac.15 yo punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre antośayyāṃ prajñāpetvā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā,
V04prmosulu:464: pac.16 yo punar bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano sāṃghikād bhikṣuvihārād bhikṣuṃ nikaḍḍheya vā nikaḍḍhāpeya vā antamasato neha bhikṣū ti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:465: pac.17 yo puna bhikṣu sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre jānan bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvaprajñaptāhi śayyāhi paścād āgatvā madhyeśayyāṃ prajñāpeya yasyodvahiṣyati so prakramiṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:466: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya udvāhanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:467: pac.18 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre upari vaihāyasakuṭikāye āhatya pādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:468: pac.19 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñceya vā siñcāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:469_0: pac.20 mahallakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ chādāpayamānena yāvad dvārakoṣārgalapratiṣṭhānam
V04prmosulu:469_1: ālokasandhiparikarmam upādāya dve vā trayo vā cchādanaparyāyā adhiṣṭhihitavyāḥ alpaharite sthitena /
V04prmosulu:470: taduttariṃ adhiṣṭhiheya alpaharite sthito pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:472: (11) bījam (12) anyavādaṃ (13) odhyāyanaṃ (14) mañca (15) śayyā (16) nikaḍḍhanaṃ /
V04prmosulu:473: (17) pūrvopagataṃ (18) vaihāyasaṃ (19) udaka (20) cchādanena // dvitīyo vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:474: pac.21 yo puna bhikṣu asaṃmato bhikṣuṇīm ovadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:475: pac.22 saṃmato vāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣūṇīm ovadeya vikāle, astaṃgate sūrye, anūhate aruṇe pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:476: pac.23 yo puna bhikṣu ovādaprekṣo bhikṣuṇīupāśrayam upasaṃkrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:478: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānā bhikṣuṇī ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā bhavati / ayam atra samayo /
V04prmosulu:479: pac.24 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō āmiṣahetor āyuṣman bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīṃ te ovadatīti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:480: pac.25 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:481: pac.26 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:483: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō mārgo bhavati sabhayo sapratibhayo sāśaṃkasaṃmato / ayam atra samayo /
V04prmosulu:484: pac.27 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvāṃ abhiruheya ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vā,
V04prmosulu:486: pac.28 yo puna bhikṣu anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra pallaṭṭhakena pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:487: pac.29 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ sīveya vā sīvāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:488: pac.30 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ pinḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeya,
V04prmosulu:491: (21) asaṃmato (22) saṃmato cāpi (23) ovādo (24) āmiṣaṃ (25) niṣadyā ca /
V04prmosulu:492: (26) adhvānamārgo (27) nāvā ca (28) deti (29) sīveti (30) paripācanena // tṛtīyo vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:493: pac.31 ekāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā agilānena āvasathapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjitavyo,
V04prmosulu:496: tatrāyaṃ samayo gilānasamayo cīvaradānakālasamayo / ayam atra samayo /
V04prmosulu:497: pac.33 yo puna bhikṣur bhuṃjāvī pravārito utthito āsanāto,
V04prmosulu:498: anatiriktaṃ kṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:499: pac.34 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣu bhuktāvī pravāritam utthitam āsanāto āsādanāprekṣo anatiriktakṛtena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā upanimantreya,
V04prmosulu:500: ehi bhikṣu khādāhi bhuṃjāhīti vā vadeya bhuktasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:501: pac.35 yo puna bhikṣur adinnam apratigrāhitaṃ mukhadvārikam āhāram āhāreya anyatrodakadantapoṇe pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:504: pac.38 bhikṣuṃ kho punaḥ kulehi upasaṃkrāntaṃ pravāreṃsu pūpehi vā manthehi vā /
V04prmosulu:507: bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā khāditavyaṃ bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:508: taduttariṃ pratigṛhṇitvā bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā vā asaṃvibhajitvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:509_0: pac.39 yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni bhavanti saṃyyathīdaṃ sarpistailaṃ
V04prmosulu:509_1: madhu phāṇitaṃ dugdhaṃ dadhi matsyaṃ māṃsaṃ yo puna bhikṣur evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītasaṃmatāni
V04prmosulu:509_2: bhojanāni ātmārthāya agilāno kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:511: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānasamayo cīvaradānakālasamayo adhvānagamanasamayo nāvābhirohaṇasamayo mahāsamayo śravaṇabhaktaṃ / ayam atra samayo /
V04prmosulu:514: (36) vikālaṃ (37) sannidhiṃ (38) manthā (39) vijñaptiḥ (40) gaṇabhojanena // caturtho vargaḥ //
V04prmosulu:515_0: pac.41 yo puna bhikṣur ātmārthāya agilāno jyotismiṃ vitāpanāprekṣo tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ
V04prmosulu:515_1: vā gomayaṃ vā sakalikāṃ vā tuṣaṃ vā saṃkāraṃ vā ādaheya vā ādahāpeya vā anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:516: pac.42 yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ uttari dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:517: pac.43 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ karmaṇā cchandaṃ datvā paścād duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano evaṃ vadeya Ō adinno me chando,
V04prmosulu:519: akṛtāny etāni karmāṇi duṣkṛtāny etāni karmāṇi,
V04prmosulu:520: nāham eteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ cchandaṃ demīti vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:521: pac.44 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō ehi tvam āyuṣman grāmaṃ pinḍāya praviśiṣyāmaḥ /
V04prmosulu:522: ahaṃ ca te tatra kiṃcid dāpayiṣyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:523: so tatra tasya kiñcid dāpayitvā vā adāpayitvā vā paścād udyojanaprekṣo evaṃ vadeya Ō gaccha tvam āyuṣman na me tvayā sārdhaṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā,
V04prmosulu:524: ekasyaiva mama phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā /
V04prmosulu:525: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyam, imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya udyojanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:526: pac.45 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya /
V04prmosulu:527: tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:528: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:530: antarāyikā evāyuṣman dharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā,
V04prmosulu:531: alaṃ ca punas tān pratiṣevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:532: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:533: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V04prmosulu:534: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:535: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣipitavyo /
V04prmosulu:537_0: pac.46 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ tathā utkṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa
V04prmosulu:537_1: vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ
V04prmosulu:537_2: saṃbhuñjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:538: pac.47 śramaṇuddeso pi ced evaṃ vadeya tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā kāmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:539: so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa evaṃ vada,
V04prmosulu:541: antarāyikā evāyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa kāmāḥ samānā antarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
V04prmosulu:542: alaṃ ca punas tān pratisevato antarāyāya /
V04prmosulu:543: evaṃ ca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V04prmosulu:544_0: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo
V04prmosulu:544_1: tasya vastusya pratinissargāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo
V04prmosulu:544_2: vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ,
V04prmosulu:545: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi nāśayitavyo Ō adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho śāstā vyapadiśitavyo /
V04prmosulu:546: yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyadagreṇa nāsti /
V04prmosulu:548_0: yo puna bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇuddeśaṃ yathāvādīṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ
V04prmosulu:548_1: dṛṣṭim apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ upasthāpeya vā upalāpeya vā saṃbhuṃjeya vā
V04prmosulu:548_2: saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:549: pac.48 navacīvaralābhinā bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatarānyataraṃ durvaṇīkaraṇam ādayitavyaṃ Ō nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā kālaśyāmaṃ vā /
V04prmosulu:550: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:551: pac.49 yo puna bhikṣur anyatra adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā, pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:552: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā udgṛhṇitavyaṃ vā udgṛhṇāpayitavyaṃ vā Ō yasya bhaviṣyati so hariṣyatīti /
V04prmosulu:553: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam / iyam atra sāmīcī /
V04prmosulu:556: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō dvyardho māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ,
V04prmosulu:557: varṣāṇāṃ ca purimo māso ity ete aḍḍhātīyamāsāḥ,
V04prmosulu:574: pac.51 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:575: pac.52 yo puna bhikṣu acelakasya vā acelikāya vā parivrājakasya vā parivrājakāye vā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:576: pac.53 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:577: pac.54 yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule praticchannāsane niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:578: pac.55 yo puna bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya gaccheya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:579: pac.56 syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo senāyāṃ gamanāya,
V04prmosulu:580: dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā tena bhikṣuṇā senāyāṃ vasitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:582: pac.57 tatrāpi ca bhikṣu dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā senāyāṃ vasamāno āyūhikaṃ vā niyūddhikaṃ vā anekavyūhaṃ vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣaṃ vā darśanāya gaccheya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:583: pac.58 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṃ prahareya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:584: pac.59 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya talaśaktikām āvarjeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:585: pac.60 yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ cchādeya,
V04prmosulu:586: so na pareṣām āroceya kiṃ ti se mā pare jānantū ti /
V04prmosulu:598: pac.61 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitād vyaparopeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:599: pac.62 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya saṃcintya kaukṛtyam upasaṃhareya kiṃ ti se muhūrtaṃ pi aphāsu bhavatū ti pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:600: pac.63 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerīye vā śikṣamāṇāye vā cīvaraṃ datvā apratyuddhareya paribhuṃjeya,
V04prmosulu:602: pac.64 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā niṣīdanaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ vā apaniheya vā apanihāpeya vā antamaśato hāsyārthaṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:603: pac.65 yo puna bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣeya pācattikam /
V04prmosulu:606: pac.68 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:607: pac.69 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:608: pac.70 yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:618: pac.71 yo puna bhikṣur jānan ūnaviṃśativarṣapudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāya upasaṃpādeya,
V04prmosulu:622: pac.72 yo puna bhikṣur jānan stainyasārthena sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:623: pac.73 yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khaneya vā khanāpeya vā antamaśato iha khanehīti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:625: taduttariṃ sādiyeya, anyatra punaḥ pravāraṇe, anyatra yāvajjīvikāye pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:626: pac.75 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evaṃ vucyamāno Ō imehi te āyuṣman pañcahi āpattikāyehi anadhyāvācāya śikṣā karaṇīyeti,
V04prmosulu:627_0: so bhikṣu tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya Ō na yāvad aham āyuṣmantānāṃ vacanena śikṣiṣyaṃ
V04prmosulu:627_1: yāvad ahaṃ na drakṣyāmi sthavirān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān madhyamān
V04prmosulu:629: tāṃs tāvad aham upasaṃkramya paripṛcchiṣyaṃ paripraśnīkariṣyaṃ ti, pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:633: pac.78 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi kalahajātehi bhaṇḍanajātehi vigrahavivādāpannehi viharantehi upaśrotrasthāne tiṣṭheya Ō yaṃ ete vadiṣyanti taṃ paścād upasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
V04prmosulu:634: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam, imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya upaśrotrasthāne pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:635: pac.79 yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃghe viniścayakathāhi vartamānāhi utthāyāsanāt prakrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:637: pac.80 yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayyāsane viharanto vikāle grāmaṃ praviśeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:651: pac.81 yo puna bhikṣu sabhakto samāno purebhaktaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ vā kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
V04prmosulu:655: pac.82 yo puna bhikṣu rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya antaḥpuraṃ praviśeyāniṣkrānte rājāne,
V04prmosulu:657: anirgatehi ratanehi antamaśato indrakīlaṃ pi atikrameya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:658: pac.83 yo puna bhikṣu dantamayaṃ vā asthimayaṃ vā śṛṅgamayaṃ vā suvarṇamayaṃ vā rūpyamayaṃ vā ratanamayaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya bhedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:659: pac.84 mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ anyatrāṭṭanīye,
V04prmosulu:661: pac.85 yo puna bhikṣuḥ tūlasaṃstṛte mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhi[ni]padyeya vā uddālanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:662: pac.86 niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:663: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag dvyardham anyatra daśavitastikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:665: pac.87 kaṇḍūpraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:666: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryag dve /
V04prmosulu:668: pac.88 varṣāśāṭikā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā /
V04prmosulu:669: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryag aḍḍhatīyaṃ /
V04prmosulu:671: pac.89 yo puna bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya Ō kiñca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ?
V04prmosulu:672: dirghaśo nava vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryak ṣaṭ /
V04prmosulu:673: idaṃ tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ /
V04prmosulu:674: tato vā punar uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:675: pac.90 yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano amūlakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:676: pac.91 yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V04prmosulu:677: pac.92 yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō adya punar ahaṃ jānāmi,
V04prmosulu:678: idānīṃ punar ahaṃ jānāmi Ō ayaṃ pi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchati /
V04prmosulu:679: yāvad ahaṃ na jānāmi tāvan nāstītthaṃ mahyam āpattir jāneṃsu ca te bhikṣu taṃ bhikṣuṃ sakṛd dvikkhuto trikkhuto āgatapūrvaṃ pi sanniṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ pi,
V04prmosulu:681: nāsti kho punas tasya bhikṣusya ajñānena muktiḥ /
V04prmosulu:682: atha khu yāṃ pi ca so bhikṣur āpattim āpanno tāṃ kṣipram eva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo,
V04prmosulu:684: tasya te āyuṣman lābhā durlabdhā yas tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne nāsthīkṛtvā na manasikṛtvā na sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya avahitaśroto satkṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣīti /
V04prmosulu:687: (81) sabhakto (82) rājño (83) sūcī gṛhaṃ (84) mañca (85) tūla (86) niṣīdanaṃ /
V04prmosulu:697: (5) jyoti (6) saprāṇakaṃ (7) sañcintya (8) ūnaviṃśati (9) sabhaktakena navamaḥ /
V04prmosulu:698: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavati śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:700: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:701: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:702: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:704: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:705: pratid.1 yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayanāsane viharanto pūrve apratisaṃveditaṃ bahirdhā apratigṛhītaṃ,
V04prmosulu:706_0: antovāsavastusminn agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya
V04prmosulu:706_1: vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman
V04prmosulu:709_0: pratid.2 yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye antaragṛhaṃ praviṣṭāye agilāno svahastaṃ
V04prmosulu:709_1: khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena
V04prmosulu:709_2: bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:712: pratid.3 bhikṣu kho punar antaragṛhe nimantritakā bhuñjanti /
V04prmosulu:713: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī viśvāsamānarūpā sthitā bhavati /
V04prmosulu:714: sā evam āha Ō iha odanaṃ dehi, iha sūpaṃ dehi, iha vyañjanaṃ dehīti vā vadeya /
V04prmosulu:715: sarvehi tehi bhikṣuhi sā bhikṣuṇī evam asya vacanīyā Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti /
V04prmosulu:716: ekabhikṣū pi ca tāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ neva vadeya Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti,
V04prmosulu:717: bhuktāvīhi tehi bhikṣūhi pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
V04prmosulu:720_0: pratid.4 yāni kho punar imāni śaikṣasaṃmatāni kulāni bhavanti tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrve
V04prmosulu:720_1: apravārito upasaṃkramitvā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya
V04prmosulu:720_2: vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman
V04prmosulu:724: (1) āraṇyakam (2) antaragṛhe (3) bhikṣū ca nimantritakāḥ (4) śaikṣasaṃmatena caturthaḥ //
V04prmosulu:725: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:727: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:728: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:729: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:731: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
V04prmosulu:732: sai.1 parimaṇḍalaṃ nivasanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:733: sai.2 parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:734: sai.3 susaṃvṛto antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:735: sai.4 na utkṣiptacakṣur antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:736: sai.5 alpaśabdo antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:737: sai.6 na uccagghikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:738: sai.7 na oguṇṭhikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:739: sai.8 na utkṣiptikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:740: sai.9 na utkuṭukāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:741: sai.10 na khambhakṛto antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:742: sai.11 na kāyapracālakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:743: sai.12 na śīrṣapracālakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:744: sai.13 na bāhuvikṣepakam antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:760: sai.14 susaṃvṛto antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:761: sai.15 na utkṣiptacakṣu antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:762: sai.16 alpaśabdo antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /

V04prmosulu:764: sai.18 na oguṇṭhikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:765: sai.19 na utkṣiptikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:766: sai.20 na osaktikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:767: sai.21 na pallatthikāya antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:768: sai.22 na khambhakṛto antaragṛhe niṣīdiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:769: sai.23 na antaragṛhe niṣaṇṇo hastakaukṛtyaṃ pādakaukṛtyaṃ vā kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:782: sai.24 satkṛtya piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:783: sai.25 samasūpaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:784: sai.26 na stūpakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:785: sai.27 nāvakīrṇakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:786: sai.28 nāvagaṇḍakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:787: sai.29 na jihvānicārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:788: sai.30 nātimahantehi kavaḍehi piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:789: sai.31 nānāgate kavaḍe mukhadvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:790: sai.32 na kavaḍotkṣepakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:791: sai.33 na kavaḍacchedakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:792: sai.34 na sakavaḍena mukhena vācaṃ bhāṣiṣyamīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /

V04prmosulu:811: sai.40 na gulugulukārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:812: sai.41 na hastanirdhūnakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:814: sai.42 na sitthāpakārakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:815: sai.43 nātivelaṃ parasya pātraṃ nidhyāyiṣyāmi odhyāyanakarmatām upādāyeti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:816: sai.44 na pātrasaṃjñī piṇḍapātaṃ pari[bhuṃji]ṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:817: sai.45 na agilāno odanaṃ vā sūpaṃ vā vyañjanaṃ vā ātmārthāya kulehi vijñāpetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃjiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:818: sai.46 na dinnadinnāni vyaṃjanāni odanena pracchādayiṣyāmi bhūyo āgamanakarmatām upādāyeti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:819: sai.47 na sasitthaṃ pātrodakaṃ pṛthivyāṃ niṣiñciṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:820: sai.48 na sasitthena pāṇinā pānīyasthālakaṃ pratigṛhṇiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:835: sai.49 na sthito niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:836: sai.50 na niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:837: sai.51 na nīcāsane niṣaṇṇo uccāsane niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:838: sai.52 na upānahārūḍhasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:839: sai.53 na pādukārūḍhasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:840: sai.54 na oguṇṭhikākṛtasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:841: sai.55 na saṃmukhāveṣṭitasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:842: sai.56 na osaktikāya niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:843: sai.57 na pallatthikāya niṣaṇṇasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:855: sai.58 na śastrapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:856: sai.59 nāyudhapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:857: sai.60 na daṇḍapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:858: sai.61 na cchatrapāṇisya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:859: sai.62 na utpathena gacchanto pathena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:860: sai.63 na pṛṣṭhato gacchanto purato gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:861: sai.64 na pādena gacchanto yānena gacchantasya agilānasya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:862: sai.65 na harite tṛṇe uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃhāṇaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:863: sai.66 na udake uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃhāṇakaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:864: sai.67 na sthito uccāraṃ vā prasrāvaṃ vā agilāno kariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
V04prmosulu:876: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:878: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:879: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:880: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:882_0: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe
V04prmosulu:882_1: uddeśam āgacchanti ye utpannotpannānām adhikaraṇānāṃ śamathāya vyapaśamathāya saṃvartante / sayyathīdaṃ Ō
V04prmosulu:890: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇaśamathā dharmāḥ /
V04prmosulu:892: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:893: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:894: pariśuddhā atrāyuḥmanto yasmāt tūḥṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:896: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ Ō dharmo anudharmaś ca anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
V04prmosulu:897: tatra dharmo nāma yam ubhayato vinayo /
V04prmosulu:899: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ dharmo anudharmaś ca /
V04prmosulu:901: dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:902: tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
V04prmosulu:903: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V04prmosulu:904: uddiṣṭaṃ kho punar āyuṣmanto prātimokṣasya vastu /
V04prmosulu:914: uddiṣṭā duve dharmāḥ, dharmo anudharmaś ca /
V04prmosulu:915: etako 'yaṃ punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmavinayo prātimokṣasūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno /
V04prmosulu:916_0: yo vā anyo 'pi kaścid dharmasya anudharmo tatra samagrehi sarvehi sahitehi saṃmodamānehi
V04prmosulu:916_1: avivadamānehi ekuddeśehi kṣīrodakībhūtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānehi sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ
V04prmosulu:917: v.1 kṣāntiḥ paramaṃ tapo titikṣā nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
V04prmosulu:918: na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śravaṇo bhoti parān viheṭhayānaḥ //
V04prmosulu:919: idaṃ tasya bhagavato vipaśyisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
V04prmosulu:920: v.2 anopavādī aparopaghātī prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro /
V04prmosulu:921: mātrajñatā ca bhaktasmiṃ prāntaṃ ca śayanāsanaṃ /
V04prmosulu:923: idaṃ tasya bhagavato śikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:924: v.3 adhicetasi mā pramādyato munino maunapadeṣu śikṣataḥ /
V04prmosulu:925: śokā na bhavanti tāyino upaśāntasya sadā smṛtīmataḥ //
V04prmosulu:926: idaṃ tasya bhagavato viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:929: idaṃ tasya bhagavato krakucchandasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
V04prmosulu:930: v.5 yathā hi bhramaro puṇyaṃ varṇagandham aheṭhayaṃ /
V04prmosulu:931: paraiti rasam ādāya evaṃ grāme muniś caret //
V04prmosulu:932: v.6 na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtaṃ /
V04prmosulu:933: ātmano tu samīkṣeta kṛtāny akṛtāni ca //
V04prmosulu:934: idaṃ tasya bhagavato konākamunisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V04prmosulu:935: v.7 nāsti dhyānam aprajñasya prajñā nāsti adhyāyato /
V04prmosulu:936: yasya dhyānaṃ ca prajñā ca sa vai nirvāṇasya antike //
V04prmosulu:937: v.8 tatrāyam ādi bhavati ihaprajñasya bhikṣuṇo /
V04prmosulu:938: indriyai guptiḥ saṃtuṣṭiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro //
V04prmosulu:939: v.9 mitraṃ bhajeta kalyāṇaṃ śuddhājīvīm atandritaṃ /
V04prmosulu:941: tataḥ prāmodya bahulo bhikṣu nirvāṇasyaiva antike //
V04prmosulu:942: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
V04prmosulu:943: v.10 cakṣuṣā saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ /
V04prmosulu:944: ghrāṇena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ jihvāya saṃvaraḥ //
V04prmosulu:945: v.11 kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ manasā sādhu saṃvaraḥ /
V04prmosulu:947: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śākyādhirājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
V04prmosulu:949: kīrtitāny aprameyāṇi ........... tiṣṭam a ......... ṇāś ca //
V04prmosulu:957: ete sapta daśabalā mahāprajñā amitabuddhī saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām abhinnān .... lokākhyādhipatīnāṃ dharmākhyānāni uktāni /
V04prmosulu:962: samāptaṃ prātimokṣasūtraṃ āryamahāsāṃghikānāṃ lokottaravādināṃ madhyoddeśikānāṃ pāṭha iti //
V04prmosulu:963: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ pi teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat* /
V04prmosulu:964: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśravaṇaḥ /
